function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupants' activities and schedules may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the houses.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to promote good hygiene practices and proper ventilation within the houses.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and UV disinfection devices.","People":"Occupants of the houses.","Owner":"Homeowners, landlords, and property managers."}]}
